name: Ripple CEO Targets Bitcoin $180K as Binance Chief Sees ‘Stronger’ BTC Ahead
description: The colossal Oracle, wet porcelain and brass, channels the prophecy from its glowing heart-circuit. Cyan-magenta algorithm flows into the kinetic spiral, driving the geometrically perfect ascension toward the mathematical sky. The ritual mechanics ensure the sacred absurd is realized.
